trans-unit.source: Although Dexterity does not pretend to work with non-CMF systems, as many components as possible should work with plain Zope 3, and even where there are dependencies on Zope 2, CMF or Plone, they should - as far as is practical - follow Zope 3 techniques and best practices. Many operations (e.g. managing objects in a folder, creating new objects or manipulating objects through a defined schema) are better designed in Zope 3 than they were in Zope 2.
trans-unit.target: 尽管Dexterity并不打算与非CMF系统一起工作,但尽可能多的组件应该与普通的Zope 3一起工作,即使在与Zope 2、CMF或Plone有依赖关系的地方,它们也应该--在实际情况下--遵循Zope 3技术和最佳实践。许多操作(如管理文件夹中的对象,创建新的对象或通过定义的模式操作对象)在Zope 3中的设计比在Zope 2中更好。

trans-unit.source: As far as possible, Dexterity should reuse components and technologies that already exist. More importantly, however, Dexterity should reuse concepts that exist elsewhere. It should be easy to learn Dexterity by analogy, and to work with Dexterity types using familiar APIs and techniques.
trans-unit.target: 在可能的情况下,Dexterity应该重用已经存在的组件和技术。然而,更重要的是,Dexterity应该重用其他地方存在的概念。通过类比学习Dexterity应该是很容易的,并且可以使用熟悉的API和技术来使用Dexterity类型。

trans-unit.source: Dexterity 2.0 is a major release of Dexterity. It has focused on getting Dexterity included in Plone core, by cleaning things up and making dependencies that are not ready for primetime optional.
trans-unit.target: Dexterity 2.0是Dexterity的一个重要版本。它的重点是让Dexterity包含在Plone核心中,清理了一些东西,并让那些还没有准备好的依赖关系成为可选的。

trans-unit.source: Dexterity is a content type framework for CMF applications, with particular emphasis on Plone. It can be viewed as an alternative to Archetypes that is more light-weight and modular.
trans-unit.target: Dexterity是一个CMF应用程序的内容类型框架,特别强调Plone。它可以被看作是Archetypes的替代方案,更加轻量级和模块化。

trans-unit.source: In order to support this change, the event handling to serialize schema changes was revised. We now register a single event handler for the SchemaModifiedEvent raised for the schema context. This allows us to keep track of the FTI that changes need to be serialized to on the schema context. The serializeSchemaOnFieldEvent and serializeSchemaOnSchemaEvent handlers were removed from the serialize module and replaced by serializeSchemaContext. The serializeSchema helper remains but is deprecated. [davisagli]
trans-unit.target: 为了支持这一变化,我们修改了序列化模式变化的事件处理方法。现在,我们为模式上下文引发的SchemaModifiedEvent注册一个单一的事件处理程序。这允许我们跟踪需要在模式上下文上序列化的变化的FTI。serializeSchemaOnFieldEvent和serializeSchemaOnSchemaEvent处理程序被从serialize模块中移除,并被serializeSchemaContext所取代。serializeSchema帮助程序仍然存在,但已经废弃。[davisagli]

trans-unit.target: 在行为编辑选项卡中加入行为描述。[davisagli]

trans-unit.target: 包含plone.formwidget.namedfile,这样文件上传和图像字段就可以直接使用。如果你想要基于blob的文件,你必须在你的环境中明确包含z3c.blobfile。[davisagli]

trans-unit.source: Mega-frameworks be damned. Dexterity consists of a number of specialised packages, each of which is independently tested and reusable. Furthermore, packages should have as few dependencies as possible, and should declare their dependencies explicitly. This helps keep the design clean and the code manageable.
trans-unit.target: 巨型框架是该死的。Dexterity由许多专门的包组成,每个包都是独立测试和可重用的。此外,包应该有尽可能少的依赖关系,并且应该明确声明它们的依赖关系。这有助于保持设计的简洁和代码的可管理性。

trans-unit.source: Moved the ‘Related Items’ behavior to plone.app.relationfield. plone.app.relationfield is no longer installed as a dependency. trans-unit.source: Support general “behaviours” that can be enabled on a custom type in a declarative fashion. Behaviours can be things like title-to-id naming, support for locking or versioning, or sets of standard metadata with associated UI elements.

trans-unit.source: The Dexterity authors still like grok and believe it makes it easier to learn how to customize Plone. However, it has been turned into an optional feature so that Dexterity has a chance to enter Plone core even if the Plone framework team doesn’t want to add grok to the already complex stack.
trans-unit.target: The Dexterity authors still like grok and believe it makes it easier to learn how to customize Plone. However, it has been turned into an optional feature so that Dexterity has a chance to enter Plone core even if the Plone framework team doesn’t want to add grok to the already complex stack.

trans-unit.source: The Dexterity design was driven by several use cases that express the way in which we want people to work with Dexterity. The end goal is to make it easy to get started, but also easy to progress from an initial prototype to a complex set of types and associated behaviours through step-wise learning and natural interaction patterns. Dexterity aims to consider its users - be they business analysts, light integrators or Python developers, and be they new or experienced - and cater to them explicitly with obvious, well-documented, natural interaction patterns.
trans-unit.target: Dexterity的设计是由几个用例驱动的,这些用例表达了我们希望人们使用Dexterity工作的方式。最终的目标是让它易于上手,同时也易于通过逐步学习和自然交互模式从最初的原型发展到一套复杂的类型和相关行为。Dexterity的目标是考虑到它的用户--无论是业务分析师、轻量级集成商还是Python开发人员,也无论是新用户还是有经验的用户--并通过明显的、有良好记录的、自然的交互模式来明确地迎合他们。

trans-unit.target: 行为控制板现在可以正确地宣告任何修改的FTI无效。[malthe]

trans-unit.source: The defaults of exclude from navigation is now obtained from a contextaware default factory, which value is obtained from an adapter. The default adapter returns False. An alternative adapter which defaults to True is provided but not registered. This change makes it possible to provide a custom context specific implementation. [jensens]
trans-unit.target: 排除导航的默认值现在是从contextaware的默认工厂获得的,这个值是从适配器获得的。默认适配器返回False。提供了一个默认为True的替代适配器,但没有注册。这个变化使得提供一个自定义的特定上下文实现成为可能。[jensens]
